sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
Hi! I'm Jhair Flores, a Systems Engineer by profession and I currently work as a Front-End Web Developer, with a passion for creating engaging and functional web experiences.
Since I started my journey in the web development world, I have been immersed in learning and exploring the latest frontend technologies and practices. My main focus is to constantly learn and grow, looking for opportunities to improve my skills and gain hands-on experience in the field.
